name: Beautiful!
greetingText: I am really lucky to have you in my life! (Too blessed to be true)
wishText: Who knew that being fashionably late on our first date would lead to this amazing journey we're on? But hey, I had to make sure my queen got her flowers, right? From those scattered dates to overcoming long-distance challenges, every moment with you has only deepened my love. And here we are, nearly a year later, stronger and more in love than ever. Thank you for your patience, your understanding, and for just being you. I know I've had my silly moments, but I promise to keep improving for you. I'm endlessly grateful that you're in my life!
